questions.title: Question 1 for Class CLIMATE102_191028
questions.main: When the air temperature is below freezing the saturation vapor pressure over water  is ________.
questions.answer: C) greater than the saturation vapor pressure over ice

mcq.option: B) less than the saturation vapor pressure over ice
C) greater than the saturation vapor pressure over ice
D) equal to the saturation vapor pressure over ice

questions.title: Question 2 for Class CLIMATE102_191028
questions.main: The reason that rising saturated air cools at a lesser rate than rising unsaturated air is:
questions.answer: E) latent heat is released by rising saturated air

mcq.option: A) rising saturated air is heavier
B) rising saturated air is lighter
C) unsaturated air expands more rapidly
D) saturated air has a higher heat capacity
E) latent heat is released by rising saturated air

questions.title: Question 3 for Class CLIMATE102_191028
questions.main: When the air temperature increases the saturation vapor pressure will:

mcq.option: D) vary over an increasingly broad range of values

questions.title: Question 4 for Class CLIMATE102_191028
questions.main: The difference between the moist and dry adiabatic rates is due to:
questions.answer: D) the fact that latent heat is released by a rising parcel of saturated air

mcq.option: A) the fact that saturated air is always unstable
B) the fact that an unsaturated air parcel expands more rapidly than a saturated air parcel
C) the fact that moist air weighs less than dry air
D) the fact that latent heat is released by a rising parcel of saturated air

questions.title: Question 5 for Class CLIMATE102_191028
questions.main: When the air is saturated which of the following statements is not correct?
questions.answer: D) an increase in temperature will cause condensation to occur

mcq.option: A) the air temperature equals the wet-bulb temperature
C) the air temperature equals the dew point temperature
D) an increase in temperature will cause condensation to occur
E) the wet bulb temperature equals the dew point temperature

questions.title: Question 6 for Class CLIMATE102_191028
questions.main: At the earth's surface a rising saturated air parcel would cool most rapidly when its temperature is:

questions.title: Question 7 for Class CLIMATE102_191028
questions.main: The most latent heat would be released in a ____ parcel of ____ saturated air.

questions.title: Question 8 for Class CLIMATE102_191028
questions.main: Explain why an inversion represents an absolutely stable atmosphere.
questions.answer: Because during an inversion the environmental lapse rate is not only small it's negative.

questions.title: Question 9 for Class CLIMATE102_191028
questions.main: The temperature to which air must be cooled in order to become saturated is the:

questions.title: Question 10 for Class CLIMATE102_191028
questions.main: The rate at which the temperature changes inside a rising (or descending) parcel of saturated air is called the:
